metadata.title: CVE-2023-6205

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP5

SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5

metadata.description: It was possible to cause the use of a MessagePort after it had already been freed, which could potentially have led to an exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 120, Firefox ESR < 115.5.0, and Thunderbird < 115.5.
